title: Makeup-free Naomi Watts walks her dog in New York City
text:
She's the Oscar-nominated actress who swapped the beaches of Sydney for bustling city life in the Big Apple.

And on Tuesday, Naomi Watts enjoyed a stroll around her local neighbourhood in New York with her beloved pet dog.

The Australian star, 51, showcased her natural beauty by going makeup free and styled her shoulder-length blonde hair in a relaxed bob.

Scroll down for video

Stepping out: A makeup-free Naomi Watts swapped her usual glamour for a long purple jacket and flared pants while taking her dog for a walk in New York City on Tuesday

The Mulholland Drive star dressed for comfort while walking her dog, stepping out in a long purple jacket which she paired with black flared pants.

Naomi completed her look by wearing thick-rimmed glasses and black and white casual shoes.

Born in Kent, in the south of England, Naomi spent her teenage years living in Sydney, where she first established her acting career.

Out and about: The Mulholland Drive star, 51, dressed for comfort while walking her dog

Naomi is mother to two sons, 12-year-old Sasha and 10-year-old Samuel Kai, whom she shares with her ex-partner Liev Schreiber.

In August, she spoke about the couple's 2016 break-up with Harper's Bazaar.

The King Kong star explained that she and Liev, who never married during their 11-year relationship, are 'better friends' now than when they were together.

Style: Naomi completed her look by wearing thick-rimmed glasses and black and white shoes

'Liev and I always knew we had to put the kids first and that, no matter what, we would respect each other and take care of each other in the best way going forward for the benefit of our children,' she said.

'We're easy with each other and we want the best for each other. Our friendship is better now than it ever was.'

Naomi wished her ex-partner a happy birthday earlier this month when he turned 52, sharing a photo to Instagram of the actor with their two sons.
description: She's the Oscar-nominated actress who swapped the beaches of Sydney for bustling city life in the Big Apple.
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
